title: Roller Skate
description: A single vibrantly colored roller skate. Colors and styles vary across platform.
apple_vendor_description: The roller skate emoji on Apple devices glides into view with a vibrant, classic design, featuring a smooth, polished finish and brightly colored accents that pop with realistic lighting. Apple's attention to detail is evident in the soft, rounded edges of the boot and the gleaming wheels, giving it a tangible, almost tactile feel. This emoji evokes a sense of fun, nostalgia, and active enjoyment, often used to suggest leisure activities, energetic movement, or a carefree spirit.
